about.title: Nordic calm. Classic taste
about.description1: At Burgers by Westers, we believe that perfection doesn't require complexity. Our philosophy is rooted in the Nordic traditions of "lagom" – the calmness of perfect balance.
about.description2: Our flavors are classic but our approach to crafting is Scandinavian : beautiful and functional with a respect for quality.

menu.title: Our Menu
menu.description: Crafted with Nordic precision and honest flavors. Every burger tells a story of quality and tradition.
menu.burgersSubtitle:
(All burgers are served on potato bread with crispy lettuce, ketchup, mustard, and our own pickles. 
 Fries & drink included in the price.)

fireJam.name: Fire Jam
fireJam.description: Cheddar, fresh jalapeño, pickled jalapeño, caramelized onion, black pepper mayo

smokeStack.name: Smoke Stack
smokeStack.description: Bacon jam, cheddar, chipotle mayo, crispy onions

tripleThreat.name: Triple Threat
tripleThreat.description: Cheddar, house cheese sauce, pepper jack, pickled red onion

blueMoon.name: Blue Moon
blueMoon.description: Blue cheese, caramelized onion, buffalo sauce

bbqJack.name: BBQ Jack (Vegan)
bbqJack.description: Pulled jackfruit, BBQ sauce, pickled red onion, vegan cheddar

bakedPotato.name: "Baked Potato"
bakedPotato.description: Bacon, scallions, sour cream, aged cheddar

cheeseLovers.name: Cheese Lovers
cheeseLovers.description: House cheese sauce, pickled red onion, pickled jalapeño

chiliCheeseFries.name: Chili Cheese Fries
chiliCheeseFries.description: Brisket chili, melted cheese, chopped red onion, sour cream

truffleParmesan.name: Truffle Parmesan
truffleParmesan.description: Truffle mayo, grated Grana Padano, pickled red onion

newsletter.title: Join the Westers Family
newsletter.description: Sign up for our newsletter and receive a coupon code for your next visit.
newsletter.privacyText: By signing up, you agree to our privacy policy. We'll send you occasional news and offers.
newsletter.successDescription: Your coupon code will be sent to your email shortly.

footer.description: Nordic-inspired burgers crafted with simplicity and precision.
